mapper.html:
Hello team,

A new customer has just joined. Here is their information:
- {{5.email}}
- {{5.metadata}}
- {{5.name}}

Thank you,
System
mapper.subject: New Subscription Created

headers.name: User-Agent
headers.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/125.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36

parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.name: rejectUnauthorized
expect.label: Reject connections that are using unverified (self-signed) certificates

expect.name: useQuerystring
expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays

mapper.html:
Hello {{5.metadata.firstName}},

Thanks for trusting us with your projectcan't wait to kick off and deliver something beautiful for you.

Additional onboarding informationplease do X Y Z. Book a call here, read this doc, etc.

Here's your ClickUp Dashboard link.

Thank you,
Stephanie @ WorkflowLoop
mapper.subject: Welcome aboard!
